attributes.action: Ensure no legislation is brought forward in Parliament if not in the party's manifesto
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Often government will introduce legislation which is a surprise to the electorate, as it has not been mentioned before.  We the undersigned wish full democracy to be exercised in this regard, and petition the Prime Minister to introduce legislation such that unless an issue has been proposed in a party's election manifesto, it cannot be brought into law.
